lead_paragraph: India's in-form opening batsman Lokesh Rahul has been ruled out of the remaining two tests against New Zealand due to a hamstring injury and has been replaced by Gautam Gambhir in the squad, the country's cricket board said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Gambhir Replaces Injured Rahul in India's Test Squad
headline.main: Gambhir Replaces Injured Rahul in India's Test Squad

snippet: India's in-form opening batsman Lokesh Rahul has been ruled out of the remaining two tests against New Zealand due to a hamstring injury and has been replaced by Gautam Gambhir in the squad, the country's cricket board said on Tuesday....
